name: Growing Charges
query:
select t2.batch_name as Batch,g1.farmer_name,g1.placed_quanity,g1.first_week_mortality,g1.total_mortality,
g1.total_feed_consumed,g1.feed_cost,g1.medicine_cost,
g1.mortality_percentage,g1.administrative_cost,g1.production_cost,g1.total_sale_quantity,g1.total_delivered_weight,
g1.net_payable_amount as Final_Amount
from `tabGrowing Charges` g1 LEFT JOIN `tabCBF Batch` AS t2 ON g1.batch = t2.name;
